content: get ready to bring a tiny piece of the arctic wilderness into your home with this polar bear crochet pattern with each stitch you re creating an eco-friendly sustainable toy for yourself or someone you love nanook the polar bear is waiting for you to bring him to life in your next crochet adventure you ll receive a downloadable 12-page pdf pattern with detailed instructions and lots of clear pictures to help you along the way the crochet pattern is also accompanied by a video tutorial to help you along i am always available to help and answer questions as well this crochet pattern is written in us terms and will be available for download immediately after purchase size using dk weight yarn and a 3 00 mm crochet hook this cozy polar bear will end up being about 11 inches tall skill level ambitious beginner - the pattern uses basic stitches simple stitch patterns & techniques simple color work and shaping __________ join me subscribe to the off the beaten hook community for free patterns video tutorials and printable guides & resources blog https //offthebeatenhook com/ instagram https //www instagram com/offthebeatenhook/ facebook https //www facebook com/offthebeatenhook pinterest https //www pinterest com/offthebeatenhook youtube https //www youtube com/@offthebeatenhook2985 this pattern is for personal use only this pattern or parts of it may not be reproduced resold distributed published altered translated posted or shared without authorization you can sell your finished items provided that you credit off the beaten hook as the designer but you may not use my photos for your listing
